description: Front Garden:T1 - Cherry Blossom - Dead, to be removed.T2 - Cherry Blossom - Dead, to be removed.T3 - Robina - Removal.T4 - Apple - Prune sufficiently to remove overhanging on street.T5 - Robina - Prune and decrease overgrowth. Back Garden:T1 - Plumb - Prune with a maximum canopy reduction of 30% in line with BS 3889.T2 - Plumb - Prune with a maximum canopy reduction of 30% in line with BS 3889.T3 - Plumb - Prune with a maximum canopy reduction of 30% in line with BS 3889.T4 - Cherry - Dead, to be removed.T5 - Pear - Dead, to be removed.T6 - Pear - Prune with a maximum canopy reduction of 30% in line with BS 3889.T7 - Pear - Prune with a maximum canopy reduction of 30% in line with BS 3889.T8 - Apple - Prune with a maximum canopy reduction of 30% in line with BS 3889.T9 - Apple - Prune with a maximum canopy reduction of 30% in line with BS 3889.(This application is in the Woodgrange Estate Conservation Area)
